document.heading: Leased Condominiums Temporary Clarification Amendment Act of 1986

history.narrative: Law 6-118, the “Leased Condominiums Temporary Clarification Amendment Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-401. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 11, 1986, and March 25, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 8, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-153 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
